scripts.copy:game-files: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const srcDir = path.join(process.cwd(), 'curatorgame', 'init'); const destDir = path.join(process.cwd(), 'dist', 'curatorgame', 'init'); if (!fs.existsSync(destDir)) fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); fs.readdirSync(srcDir).forEach(file => { fs.copyFileSync(path.join(srcDir, file), path.join(destDir, file)); }); console.log('Game files copied successfully');"
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:timelines && npm run generate:comparisons
